title: AMUMU LIVES MATTER. Neeko can ult out of Amumu ult
body: Neeko can just R out of Amumu's R. After a short preparation neeko leaps into the air gains shield and when lands damages and stuns. Amumu's ult renders those in it unable to attack or move. So why after an amumu ult can neeko not only jump making half of amumu's ult useless, but also damage after landing making the other half of amumu's ult useless?{{champion:32}}  thats a good pose amumu i really question this mechanic too maybe its the fabled "true untargetable" cant wait until they add true to everything.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=nowjoeblessedup,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AmATNnLW,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-15T04:52:13.831+0000)
>
> Neeko can just R out of Amumu&#039;s R. After a short preparation neeko leaps into the air gains shield and when lands damages and stuns. Amumu&#039;s ult renders those in it unable to attack or move. So why after an amumu ult can neeko not only jump making half of amumu&#039;s ult useless, but also damage after landing making the other half of amumu&#039;s ult useless?{{champion:32}}  thats a good pose amumu i really question this mechanic too maybe its the fabled &quot;true untargetable&quot; cant wait until they add true to everything.

Neeko's ult is neither a mobility spell nor an autoattack, so Amumu's ult has no effect on it, by design. This is clearly an intended interaction, not a bug.

Neeko is full of bugs actually
but , If Neeko Used her Ult before Amumu then she should be rewarded for it
Neeko can't do this if Amumu Ults first then

i dont know if she should be rewarded for hitting a button is a good reason, because shouldnt the amumu be rewarded for using his ult but also for his outplay in timing it correctly? she is a new character so clearly there are going to be bugs but a description is not hard to get that off.

if her Ult is a button then Amumu's Ult too
and I find Neeko Ult harder to land than Amumu's
He has a Q gap close and the CC is insta 
While Neeko has to flash in if she wanna make plays like Amumu and she is still delayed
if Amumu used his Ult correctly then the same goes for Neeko
so its just based on whoever has the harder ability to land gets it, understood.

Well yeah that being said , Amumu is a tank , and  he is a play maker who has to engage by dashing in and Ulting like 4 enemies usually , if Neeko uses her Ult only for this Amumu then that's positive for Amumu , a Tank's mission is to absorb damage and make enemies got on cool downs for his team to follow him
lol im not following no amumu into a fiight with neeko's r nuke then. screw that teammate. he cant absorb an aoe for his team.
a Tank building MR wouldn't get Nuked tho lol
didnt mean you description sorry, meant the description of each of their ults
